section.heading: About me
section.description: My name is Andrew Zheng and I am currently a Junior at American High School. I am aiming towards a major in the field of Computer Science. Besides CS, I also enjoy doing many other activities such as playing video games, cubing, and taking photographs. After school, I like to relax by watching YouTube for 4 hours straight and then feel guilty about not doing any work. However, I still manage to keep up with homework and have decent grades.
